about.title: About Us
about.lead: Purpeon Digital is an innovative consultancy firm, and our consultants have many years of experience helping businesses navigate the complexity of modern technology.
about.description1: Extensive experience from various industries, both public and private sector, gives us unique insight into the challenges businesses face today.
about.description2: With expertise spanning both IT and hardware, we are in a unique position to offer comprehensive technology solutions.
about.description3: The name Purpeon Digital comes from the flower foxglove (Digitalis purpurea), which was also the county flower of Sogn og Fjordane, thus reflecting our local connection and identity.
